item.title: Quotes
item.description: Hello World Don’t worry about people stealing your ideas. If your ideas are any good, you’ll have to ram them down people’s throats. ― Howard Aiken, from the book “Steal Like an Artist” What is originality? Undetected plagiarism ― William Ralph Inge, from the book “Steal Like an Artist” Documentation should always be written with the assumption that only the examples are read. ― Prakhar Srivastav

item.title: About
item.description: This is a blog about how Nitin Isloorkar, Sumit Mathur and I went 2006 about our summer project in IIT Bombay.

item.title: About
item.description: I am a freak, an atheist, a thinker, a problem sniffer, a workaholic, a music nerd, a free software advocate, a virus, a bathroom singer, a woman lover, a photographer, a chess player, an idiot, a clown, and alive. I was born in 1987 at Ahmedabad, Gujrat (India). The part after that gets very confusing. So, I have organized the names of the places I have lived in (for myself): Place Period School Ahmedabad 7 yrs Thumblina (Nursery, KG1 KG2), St.
